author: @e1e5en
name: SwipeGesture
shortDescription: Detect swipe gestures based on their distance and duration.
description:
Use the "Enable swipe detection" action once at the beginning of your scene.

Note: This extension does not support multitouch.

Expressions:

- `StartPointX`, `StartPointY`: Coordinates of the point where the swipe starts
- `EndPointX`, `EndPointY`: Coordinates of the swipe end point
- `Distance`: Length of the swipe, in pixels
- `DistanceX`, `DistanceY`: Distance the swipe moved in each axis
- `Angle`: Direction the swipe moved towards. Range (-180, 180)
- `Layer`: Layer used to detect swipe gestures

Conditions:

- `Is swipe detection enabled`
- `Is swipe in progress?` - A swipe starts when the mouse click or touch begins
- `Is swipe valid?` - A swipe is valid if it passes the distance and duration restrictions
- `Has swipe just ended?` - When the mouse or touch is released, this condition is true for one frame 
- `Swipe moved in a direction (4-way movement)` - the direction value for 4 sides (UP, DOWN, LEFT, RIGHT). In this case, the “circle” is divided into 4 segments of 90 degrees
- `Swipe moved in a direction (8-way movement)` - the direction value for 8 sides (UP, DOWN, LEFT, RIGHT, UP-LEFT, UP-RIGHT, DOWN-LEFT, DOWN-RIGHT). In this case, the “circle” is divided into 8 segments of 45 degrees.

events.name: Detect if a swipe has ended
Detect if a new swipe started

eventsFunctions.description: Enable (or disable) swipe gesture detection.
eventsFunctions.name: EnableSwipeDetection
eventsFunctions.sentence: Enable swipe detection: _PARAM1_

eventsFunctions.description: Draw a line that indicates the current swipe gesture.  Edit "Outline Size" of the shape painter to adjust the thickness of the line.
eventsFunctions.name: DrawSwipe
eventsFunctions.sentence: Draw a line with _PARAM1_ that shows the current swipe
